titleStmt.title: The battaile on Hopton-Heath in Staffordshire, betweene His Majesties forces under the Right Honourable the Earle of Northampton, and those of the rebels, March 19. Together with a letter from the Lord Compton now Earle of Northampton.
titleStmt.author: Northampton, James Compton, Earl of, 1622-1681.

notesStmt.note: Contains a letter from the Earl of Northampton to his mother describing how his father was killed in battle dated March 22, 1642.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
